abstract: While its rivals have spent much of the past year regaining market share lost during the financial crisis, JPMorgan Chase sat atop Dealogic’s investment banking league tables for the first quarter of 2010. (It slipped in mergers advisory, however.)

lead_paragraph: While its rivals have spent much of the past year regaining market share lost during the financial crisis, JPMorgan Chase sat atop Dealogic’s investment banking league tables for the first quarter of 2010.

headline.main: JPMorgan Keeps Lead in I-Banking League Tables
